items.description: Combine rows from two or more tables
items.example: SELECT * FROM t1 INNER JOIN t2 ON t1.id = t2.id;

items.description: Group rows that have the same values
items.example: SELECT COUNT(id), country FROM customers GROUP BY country;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY country ASC;

items.description: Insert new records into a table
items.example: INSERT INTO table (col1, col2) VALUES (val1, val2);

items.description: Modify existing records in a table
items.example: UPDATE table SET col1 = val1 WHERE condition;
